propertiesMeta.name: cellBackground
propertiesMeta.description: Background color of the cells in this column

propertiesMeta.name: textColor
propertiesMeta.description: Text color of the cells in this column

propertiesMeta.name: name
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the property in the srcData object. If not defined the column adresses the full object (usefull if the data is an array containing simple datatypes).

propertiesMeta.name: label
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the label for this column

propertiesMeta.name: control
propertiesMeta.description: Type of the input elements for this column

propertiesMeta.name: width
propertiesMeta.description: Width for this column

propertiesMeta.name: widthUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Width unit for this column. px defines an absolute width, % is relative to the control width and factor can be used to divide the available space into fractions.

propertiesMeta.name: editable
propertiesMeta.description: Can this column be edited (text, number) or operated (button, checkbox)?

propertiesMeta.name: minWidth
propertiesMeta.description: Minimum width for this column

propertiesMeta.name: minWidthUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Minimum width unit for this column

propertiesMeta.name: resize
propertiesMeta.description: Can this column be resized? Columns that have factor as their widthUnit can never be resizeable.

propertiesMeta.name: sortable
propertiesMeta.description: Can this column be sortedby user interaction?

propertiesMeta.name: horizontalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Horizontal alignment of this column

propertiesMeta.name: verticalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Vertical alignment of this column

propertiesMeta.name: headerHorizontalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Horizontal alignment of the header of this column

propertiesMeta.name: headerVerticalAlignment
propertiesMeta.description: Vertical alignment of the header of this column

propertiesMeta.name: format
propertiesMeta.description: A reference of function which is called with each entry

propertiesMeta.name: dataDefinitions
propertiesMeta.description:
Mapping from the srcData to a combobox or image selection. 
Text to show on Buttons. 
Restrictions for number inputs.

propertiesMeta.name: ignoreEscapeSequences
propertiesMeta.description: When set to true a backslash in a text will be shown verbatim in the HMI

propertiesMeta.name: autoFocusOut
propertiesMeta.description: When set to true the control will automatically lose focus when the user presses the enter or escape key

propertiesMeta.name: autoSelectText
propertiesMeta.description: When set to true all text within the control will be selected when the control gains focus

Mapping from the srcData to a combobox or image selection.

Restrictions for number inputs.

propertiesMeta.name: ignoreEscapeSequences
propertiesMeta.description: When set to true a backslash in a text will be shown verbatim in the HMI

propertiesMeta.name: autoFocusOut
propertiesMeta.description: When set to true the control will automatically lose focus when the user presses the enter or escape key

propertiesMeta.name: autoSelectText

propertiesMeta.name: value
propertiesMeta.description: Value which is compared to select this image.

propertiesMeta.name: source
propertiesMeta.description: Path to the image.

propertiesMeta.name: width
propertiesMeta.description: Pixel width for this image

propertiesMeta.name: height
propertiesMeta.description: Pixel height for this image

propertiesMeta.name: text
propertiesMeta.description: Alt text (tooltip) for this image

propertiesMeta.name: value
propertiesMeta.description: Value which is compared to create this entry.

propertiesMeta.name: text
propertiesMeta.description: Text to show for this entry

anyOf.title: Definition for a numeric input control

propertiesMeta.name: minValue
propertiesMeta.description: The minimal value of the numeric input. No restrictions if it's unset.

propertiesMeta.name: maxValue
propertiesMeta.description: The maximal value of the numeric input. No restrictions if it's unset.

propertiesMeta.name: decimalDigits
propertiesMeta.description: Number of displayed decimal digits. No restrictions if it's unset.

propertiesMeta.name: decimalPrecisionMode
propertiesMeta.description: Select whether decimal digits are rounded or truncated.

propertiesMeta.name: unit
propertiesMeta.description: Unit of the numeric input. Only has a visual effect.

propertiesMeta.name: resetToLastValidValue
propertiesMeta.description: Whether the displayed text is reset to the last valid value on focus out.

anyOf.title: Definition for a spinbox input control

propertiesMeta.name: step
propertiesMeta.description:
Defines in which step increasing/decreasing the value is possible. 
If you define a decimal number here it is recommended to set the 'decimal digits' property too to have an effect.

propertiesMeta.name: minValue
propertiesMeta.description: The minimal value of the numeric input. No restrictions if it's unset.

propertiesMeta.name: maxValue
propertiesMeta.description: The maximal value of the numeric input. No restrictions if it's unset.

propertiesMeta.name: decimalDigits
propertiesMeta.description: Number of displayed decimal digits. No restrictions if it's unset.

propertiesMeta.name: decimalPrecisionMode
propertiesMeta.description: Select whether decimal digits are rounded or truncated.

propertiesMeta.name: unit
propertiesMeta.description: Unit of the numeric input. Only has an aesthetic effect.

propertiesMeta.name: resetToLastValidValue
propertiesMeta.description: Whether the displayed text is reset to the last valid value on focus out.

propertiesMeta.name: text
propertiesMeta.description: Defines the text of the button.
